job.title: Full Stack Software Engineer (Infrastructure Services)
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brImagine what you could do here At Apple new ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products services and customer experiences very quickly Bring passion and dedication to your job and theres no telling what you could accomplishbrbrbrThe Infrastructure Services Software Development team is looking for a passionate and selfmotivated engineer to be part of a diverse fast paced and highenergy team You will design and implement tools services and applications that enable Network and Data Center operation teams to work effortlessly You will chip in to key and innovative technology which supports major Apple applications with all the scalability and highavailability requirements that entails Collaborating with other groups to lead and deliver elite products in an exciting rapidly changing environmentbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong br5 years of full stack development experiencebrbrStrong frontend technology stack including HTML CSS JavaScript and React UI FrameworkbrbrGood website design experience including developing wireframes and UXbrbrQuick prototyping and iterative skills with building REST services and UIFrontends for proof of conceptsbrbrStrong Java Programming skillsbrbrExperience with Spring boot based microservicesbrbrExperience with NoSQL databasesbrbrExperience writing effective unit tests and debugging skillsbrbrNice to have good troubleshooting production issuesbrbrBuilding applications and products with scale and performance in mindbrbrCustomer focused and agilebrbrWe seek a self starter visionary person with strong leadership capabilitiesbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brYou will use your technical expertise to implement new features and improvements You should be comfortable with rapidlyevolving designs and requirements and have excellent communication skills Success depends on influencing other teams that run Apples infrastructure and datacenter operations You will have a sense of customerfocused solutions that just work and keep this in mind at every stage of development You will articulate ideas clearly within our team and collaborate with other organizations at Applebrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBSMS in Computer Science or related field or equivalent work experiencebrbr brRole Number 200259183brbr
